name: Bizarre Harvest Conspiracy
description:
Controls:
  • A and D to move
  • B to build. Use the arrow keys to select buildings. Press Enter to build. Press Escape or Backspace to cancel out.
  • E to interact with stuff
Information:

Bizarre Harvest Conspiracy is a jam game that was made in about 30 hours. It's a mix of strategy, farming, management, and survival.

Since this was a jam game, it is unbalanced, unpolished, and unfinished. It's way too easy right now, and once you figure it out, you'll be invincible. However, I'd really like to keep working on it and, if there's enough interest, maybe I will.
